name: CUSTOM Shop The Look #3
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign images_position_mobile = section.settings.images_position_mobile
  assign images_position = section.settings.images_position
  
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color

  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt

  assign content_horizontal_align = section.settings.content_horizontal_align
  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = section.settings.content_horizontal_align_mobile

  assign text_align = ""
  if content_horizontal_align == "start"
    assign text_align = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align == "center"
    assign text_align = "center"
  else
    assign text_align = "right"
  endif

  assign text_align_mobile = ""
  if content_horizontal_align_mobile == "start"
    assign text_align_mobile = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align_mobile == "center"
    assign text_align_mobile = "center"
  else
    assign text_align_mobile = "right"
  endif

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color

  assign item_image_ratio = section.settings.item_image_ratio
  assign item_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.item_image_ratio_mobile
  assign item_image_radius = section.settings.item_image_radius
  assign item_image_border_thickness = section.settings.item_image_border_thickness
  assign item_image_border_color = section.settings.item_image_border_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_space = section.settings.arrow_space
  assign arrow_space_mobile = section.settings.arrow_space_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .shop-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }

  .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .shop-image-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }

  .shop-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .shop-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shop-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shop-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .shop-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .shop-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shop-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px;
    max-width: 90%;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    position: relative;
  }

  .shop-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    text-decoration: none;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ item_image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ item_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .shop-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-style: normal;
  }

  .shop-slide-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.8;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile | times: 0.8 }}px;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
    text-decoration: line-through !important;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    top: 50% !important;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: -{{ arrow_size_mobile | plus: arrow_space_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: -{{ arrow_size_mobile | plus: arrow_space_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
    margin-left: 2px;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: -2px;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: 20px;
    position: static !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    margin: 0px !important;
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important;
    border-radius: 50% !important;
    opacity: 0.6 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    opacity: 1 !important;
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px !important;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile  }}px !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s !important;
  }

  @media(min-width: 768px) {
    .shop-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 60%;
    }
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .shop-body-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: center;
    }

    .shop-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 50%;
    }

    .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .shop-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .shop-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .shop-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .shop-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .shop-slide-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ price_size | times: 0.8 }}px;
    }

    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }
    
    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
      opacity: 0 !important;
    }

    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
      left: -{{ arrow_size | plus: arrow_space }}px !important;
    }
  
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      right: -{{ arrow_size | plus: arrow_space }}px !important;
    }

    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
    }

    .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px !important;
    }

  }

  @media(min-width: 1400px) {
    .shop-slider-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 40%;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .shop-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if price_custom %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ price_font.family }}, {{ price_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ price_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ price_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if images_position_mobile == "top" %}
  <style>
    .shop-images-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }

    .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .shop-images-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 2;
    }

    .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
      order: 1;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if images_position == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {

      .shop-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: 55% 45%;
      }
      
      .shop-images-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }

      .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {

      .shop-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: 45% 55%;
      }
      
      .shop-images-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 1;
      }

      .shop-content-{{ section.id }} {
        order: 2;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .shop-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-image-{{ section.id }}{
       aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if item_image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif item_image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif item_image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if item_image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif item_image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif item_image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} shop-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="shop-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="shop-images-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <div class="shop-image-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
              {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
              {% else %}
                {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
              {% endif %}
            </div>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        <div class="shop-content-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if heading != blank %}
            <div class="shop-heading-{{ section.id }}">
              {{ heading }}
            </div>
          {% endif %}

          <div class="shop-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
            <div class="shop-slider-inner-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="shop-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
                <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                  {% for block in section.blocks %}
                    <{% if block.settings.product != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="shop-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                      <div class="shop-slide-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                          <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                        {% else %}
                          {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                      
                      <p class="shop-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.product != blank %}
                        {{ block.settings.product.title }}
                        {% else %}
                          Product Title
                        {% endif %}
                      </p>
                      
                      {% if block.settings.product != blank %}
                        <div class="shop-slide-price-{{ section.id }}">
                          <p class="shop-slide-regular-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.price | money }}</p>
                          {% if block.settings.product.compare_at_price != blank %}
                            <strong>-</strong> <p class="shop-slide-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                          {% endif %}
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    </{% if block.settings.product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                  {% endfor %}
                </div>
                <div class="shop-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
              </div>
              <button class="shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g id="Left"><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
              </button>
              <button class="shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><g id="Left"><path d="M14,17a1,1,0,0,1-.707-.293l-4-4a1,1,0,0,1,0-1.414l4-4a1,1,0,1,1,1.414,1.414L11.414,12l3.293,3.293A1,1,0,0,1,14,17Z"/></g></svg>
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initShopTheLook3() {
    const slider = new Swiper(".shop-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.shop-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.shop-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.shop-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: 'bullets',
        clickable: true,
      }
    });

    slider.on('slideChange', function () {
      const activeSlideId = slider.slides[slider.activeIndex].id;
      const collectionItems = document.querySelectorAll('.shop-image-{{ section.id }}');
    
      collectionItems.forEach(item => {
        item.classList.remove('active');
        if (item.getAttribute('data-id') === String(activeSlideId)) {
          item.classList.add('active');
        }
      });
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initShopTheLook3);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initShopTheLook3);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initShopTheLook3);
  }
</script>
